jobDescription: Data Scientist  Founded in 2000, we are a leading provider of independent corporate bond research. Over 7,000 investment professionals and risk managers at over 1,000 institutions worldwide use our research every day.  Our independent research is a leading voice in global credit markets, with our experts contributing to market news in Bloomberg, The Wall Street Journal, Forbes, Financial Times, Business Insider, Barrons and many more. Top Reasons to Work with Us
